caption.text:
Throwback to Milan with Formafantasma x Flos WireLine.
Formafantasma DAE Alumni who are teaching at the ‘BA Man and Well Being’ and 'MA Contextual Design' Departments of DAE. 'Further elaborating on some of the design principles of our previous lamp WireRing, the studio is again using the power cable as one of the main design features. Flattened to resemble a belt made of rubber and hanging from the ceiling, the cable holds a ribbed glass extrusion containing a LED light source.' #DAEAlumni #DAE #designacademyeindhoven #mwd #salonedelmobile #iSalone #salonedelmobile2019 #mdw2019 #mdw19
#venturafuture #breradesigndistrict #milandesignweek #research #design #euroluce
